title: Do You Understand?
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Wow! DiverDiva’s live concert was so fun!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Yeah, that was a fantastic performance.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Well, aren’t you honest?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>.....Well, it’s not like I have any reason to not be honest.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Do you think you’re as honest as Kasumin?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>I don’t want to be that honest.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>What do you mean by that!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>I said what I said. As you grow up, you realize there are some things that you should keep to yourself. There are some subtleties you have to pay attention to. Do you understand?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>What’s a “subtlety”?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Oh, come on!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
